description: This file defines a custom Android view called ChessBoardView that renders a chessboard with pieces, highlights, and handles user interaction such as tap gestures to select and move pieces.

classes.name: ChessBoardView
classes.description: A custom View component that displays a chessboard, pieces, and interaction highlights, managing layout and drawing logic.

methods.name: setBoard
methods.description: Updates the current board state and highlights, then redraws the view.

methods.name: setGameController
methods.description: Sets the game controller instance which handles user interaction logic.

methods.name: onMeasure
methods.description: Determines the size of the view, enforcing minimum cell size for touch targets.

methods.name: onSizeChanged
methods.description: Recomputes geometry when the view size changes.

methods.name: onDraw
methods.description: Draws the chessboard, pieces, and highlights on the canvas.

methods.name: onTouchEvent
methods.description: Handles touch events to detect square taps and notify the controller.
